post.text: Si Trump insiste que lo que él dijo sobre las mujeres es "charla de vestidor", es evidente que no está arrepentido.

comment.author: Hailey
comment.text: Sorry?! Are YOU sorry for the 4 men that were tortured and sodomized on YOUR watch?! Will you EVER apologize to their families?! HA!! What difference does it make??

replies.author: Mason
replies.text: Exactly!!! All those families she destroyed!! And the ones BILL ruined by raping

replies.author: Hailey
replies.text: The whole family is sick!! They don't care about anyone but themselves!! Those that think otherwise are fools They better vote TRUMP!!

replies.author: Cory
replies.text: BleachBit Hillary's Underwear...we she she attracts FLIES!
